## IColorChannel.setChannel() method

Replaces selected color channel with values from given pixel buffer, which MUST be of same size as target.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setChannel(id: C, buf: IPixelBuffer<T, number> | number): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | <code>C</code> |  |
|  buf | <code>IPixelBuffer&lt;T, number&gt; &#124; number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
